creator: guru.balse@oracle.com

text:
I'm not in favour of protected access to fields. If you need access to these it
would be better to add an appropriate setter and getter.
creator: conor@apache.org
dodgymike@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 21825
patch to make it SQLExec extendable

This patch adds two getter/initializers for the 'conn' and 'statement' objects and  modifies the code to use them.

Sorry - I didn't mention the reason for the patch - I have a class that extends SQLExec, but found that the rather useful protected methods (eg. 'runStatements') don't initialize 'statement' and 'conn', which makes using them in a sub-class impossible. This fixes that issue.
creator: dodgymike@gmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
svn rev 675894

Thanks for the patch

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: needs svn rev 675911 in addition in order to avoid a NullPointerException if isValidRdbms returned false.
